title: Day Three From Milken Global Conference
itunes:title: Day Three From Milken Global Conference
description:
Cathie Wood, CEO of Ark Invest, discusses her strategy for investing in China, as well as her thoughts on Tesla. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber shares the details of the Businessweek Magazine story Retrofitting Buildings Is the Unsexy Climate Fix the World Needs. Mark Jenkins, Head of Global Credit at Carlyle Group, shares his outlook for the credit markets. Kate Barton, EY’s Global Vice Chair of Tax, talks about the proposed OECD global tax deal.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
